overview:
Alexis Tinel is CEO and Co-founder of Getyoo (http://getyoo.com/), simple wireless information exchange devices, allowing users to connect to people, objects and â€˜thingsâ€™ in real life in order to exchange information and retrieve all the data selected on a free web-based platform. Alexis manages the company but more especially the Sales and Business Development by creating strategic partnerships.

Prior to Getyoo Alexis worked for UBIFRANCE (http://www.ubifrance.fr/) where he was responsible for Strategy and International Business Development of a French company (wholesalers of fashion jewelry). He helped accelerate this company by launching a first subsidiary in London (Great Britain).

Prior to UBIFRANCE, Alexis was Senior Sales Executive at Lyreco (http://lyreco.com/). During his tenure, he developed existing and new accounts. He was responsible for analyzing customersâ€™ needs and leading negotiations.

Alexis holds a Post University Degree in Business Administration and Management from the Brussels Management School, ICHEC.
